Package br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.object2d

This package contains the visual components of the game, including cards, energy/life bars and the map, for example.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BackCard Visual representation of a card when it's placed on the field turned down.
Deck2D A visual representation of the player deck.
Effect2D A representation of an effect on the field.
EnergyBar A visual representation of the player energy.
Fighter2D A representation of an fighter on the field.
FixedObject Abstract class inherited by all fixed objects on the screen, that is, the objects which remain on the same horizontal position relative to the camera.
HandBackground Represents the background of the player's hand on the screen.
HandCard Specifies how the cards look and behave on the player's hand.
LifeBar A visual representation of the player/enemy current life.
Map2D A visual representation of the map.
MenuButton The pause button.
Pentagram A Pentagram object is shown when the human player selects a card, in order to inform him where it's possible to place his cards.
Timer2D A visual representation of the remaining time of the current match.
TransitionControl A TransitionControl object is an arrow pointing either to the right or left, moving the camera to the specified direction in a BattleScreen.
Trap2D A representation of a trap on the field.
 

Package br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.object2d Description

This package contains the visual components of the game, including cards, energy/life bars and the map, for example. These classes are used in the visual layer.
